overview.subtitle: Please fill out the following information
overview.notice: By submitting the request, all informations in this application will be transfered.

personalDataCompleted.I: I, **%{firstname}** **%{lastname}**, certify being **%{maritalStatus}** and caring for %{numberOfDependants} dependent children
personalDataCompleted.work: I am currently **%{employmentStatus}** with a **%{employmentContract}** and receive a salary of **%{salary}€** per month after tax, and **%{additionalIncome}€** pr month of additional income.
personalDataCompleted.property: I am the **%{propertyStatus}** of my housing. The sum of my loans is **%{creditsTotalAmount}€** pr month, out of which **%{propertyLoan}€** per month are for my property loan.
personalDataCompleted.address: My address is **%{address}**. My phone number is [**%{phone}**](tel://%{phone}) and my email address is [**%{email}**](mailto:%{email}).

amount.title: Amount
amount.subtitle: What amount would you like to request?
amount.label: Loan amount

duration.title: Duration
duration.subtitle: Over what time period would you like to reimburse the loan?
duration.label: Loan duration

personalDataForm.title: Personal informations
personalDataForm.subtitle: Please fill out the following information to complete your application

completedStatus.main: %{smart_count} information out of %{total} |||| %{smart_count} informations out of %{total}

documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Collect the following documents to complete your application.

upload.conflict_error: A file with the same name is already uploaded. Please rename your file.
upload.error: An error occured during the upload

unlink.title: Detach from your application?
unlink.subtitle: You'll detach this file from your application.
unlink.text: The file will not be deleted from your documents

completedStatus.main: %{smart_count} document out of %{total} |||| %{smart_count} documents out of %{total}

success.title: [DEMO] Your loan request has been generated
success.text: In a live scenario, the loan request would have been transmitted to your bank. At the moment, an archive containing the request informations has been placed in your documents.

error.title: Your loan request couldn't be completed
error.text: An error has occured while submittng your loan request.
